title: Ramnaryan
text: About the Groww platform recently huge users have complained that when they add money to Groww account from their bank account, the process is done instantly. But when they withdraw money from a Groww account to their bank account, it takes a very long time. This disparity is affecting the customer experience. 1. The process of adding funds from the bank to Groww is completed in a few minutes. 2.When a user transfers money from the Groww app to his bank account, it often takes 1-2 working days.
author: Ramnaryan
